Articles.Content:
maps (in tracking center at the very least) should have a layer to show biomes you discovered. and depending on how good scanner is they should be fuzzy and small ones might be missing

Edited February 28, 2023 by USAGuerrilla

On 2/28/2023 at 7:51 PM, USAGuerrilla said:

maps (in tracking center at the very least) should have a layer to show biomes you discovered. and depending on how good scanner is they should be fuzzy and small ones might be missing

This will probably be added when Science is added... which I assume is months away
I haven't even looked...where does one read what biome they're in in KSP2? Wasn't it not even displayed in KSP1 without running a science experiment or mods?
